Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.inputs

Class CommandPromptResult

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.inputs.CommandPromptResult
Direct Known Subclasses:
StartUpPrompt
public class CommandPromptResult extends Object
This class represents the result of a command prompt.
